item.title: Predicting Blood Donations: Part 2
item.description: Purpose This post shows some basic modeling methods in R. Specifically, I model blood donation data with a linear and logit model. These models are well established an easy to inerpret. In a future post Iâ€™ll explore some more flexible models that might improve prediction. Linear regression with lm A linear model is the simplest and best understood method for modeling data, as well as a building block for more sophisticated methods.
